title: Empower retrospective-agent to create new bugs and features
description: Extend retrospective-agent to analyze session patterns and create new bugs or features when it identifies missing work items, technical debt, or improvement opportunities during its analysis.
user_impact: Enables proactive issue identification and backlog health
resolution_notes: Added comprehensive pattern-based issue creation capabilities to retrospective-agent including pattern detection logic, bug/feature creation workflows with complete metadata templates, duplicate detection, and retrospective report integration.
